ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: Time to Pixie myself again and see the numbers :) Thanks Rokken!  You are always on the mark! Sylly p.s. I don t wanna mention this but.... clipped from:
ygData.messageBody:
Time to Pixie myself again and see the numbers :)

Thanks Rokken! You are always on the mark!

Sylly

p.s. I don't wanna mention this but....

clipped from:

http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/Songs/Song28.htm
Quantified: Mesmerizes the target for anywhere from 0 to 15 seconds and
lowers the targets MR slightly. Using a wind instrument has an unknown
effect, if any. High charisma helps with success rate and duration.

Notes: The stun component of this song may be broken.

Analysis by Rokenn Swiftsong, Karana server

Heh, /bonk rokken!

----- Original Message -----
From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 8:29 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?


> /bonk sylly
>
> Pixie Strike decrease Magic Resistance. Using a flute is a bigger debuff
> then singing. Using a mino horn is a bigger debuff then using a flute
>
> /bonk sylly
>
> :)
>
> Rokenn
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> > Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 6:05 AM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
> >
> >
> > Good question - what gets 15% better?
> >
> > The only wind based song that I know that shows a difference with an
> > instrument is Charillion - has someone quantified the effect
> > with this song?
> >
> > 15% more air under water?
> > 15% more invisible?
> > 15% further away with shadow step? - hmm possible
> > 15% better see invis?
> > 15% better charms & pixie strikes? Is there a longer duration with
> > intrument?
> > 15% higher levitation? possible i guess
> > 15% better bind sight?
> >
> > And the expansion ones - we don seem to even know what they do.
> >
> > Sylly
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
> > To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 7:36 AM
> > Subject: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
> >
> >
> > > http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/Instruments.htm
> > >
> > > Now reports:
> > > Minotaur Horn - Wind ****** +15% song *******
> > >
> > > Wow, when did this change?
> > >
> > > If it's correct, this is absolutely awesome but I have
> > > to wonder how it was measured ...
> > >
